SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss. Jacqueline Decker’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope everyone realizes mental health is a key piece in a child's success…”

– Miss. Jacqueline Decker, Elementary Counselor @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/mental-health-child-success/
